#Text=Bato says : " This ship is sentimental to me .
#Text=" Bato says : " Yep !
#Text=It 's got the scar to prove it .
#Text=Ha .
#Text=How ' bout you Sokka ?
#Text=You must have some good stories from your first time ice dodging .
#Text=" Katara says : " He never got to go .
#Text=Dad left before he was old enough .
#Text=" Bato says : " Oh , I forgot you were too young .
#Text=" Aang says : " What 's ice dodging ?
#Text=" Bato says : " It 's a rite of passage for young Water Tribe members .
#Text=When you turn fourteen , your dad takes you - You know what , you 're about to find out !
#Text=" Zuko says : " Why are we stopping ?
#Text=" June says : " Because the girl must have spent a lot of time here .
#Text=" Zuko says : " We have no time for this !
#Text=" Zuko says : " Hey !
#Text=Watch it !
#Text=" June says : " Oh look , he likes you !
#Text=" Aunt Wu says : " Care to hear your fortune , handsome ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " At my age , there 's really only one big surprise left , and I 'd just as soon leave it a mystery .
#Text="
